Principal 526321 Telefone Direto 217500573 Extensão pessoal 526321 Email ansouto@ciencias.ulisboa.pt Carreira Docente Universitário Categoria Professor Auxiliar Indicadores ResearcherID Orcid Scopus Google Scholar CiênciaVitae Palavras Chave Quantum criptography primitives Kolmogorov complelity Computational complexity Keywords Quantum computation Kolmogorov complexity Cryptography Currículo Resumido I made my PhD in FCUP in 2011 on computational and Kolmogorov complexity. In 2012 I got a Pos-Doc scholarship to work on quantum computation, in which I majorly develop my work with special interest into cryptographic applications.
